title: #127: Dr. Dennis Gross Pt. 2 - Anti-Aging Techniques, Thinning Skin, Acne & Acne Causes, Skincare Myths, Filler & Fats, & Baby Botox
itunes:title: #127: Dr. Dennis Gross Pt. 2 - Anti-Aging Techniques, Thinning Skin, Acne & Acne Causes, Skincare Myths, Filler & Fats, & Baby Botox
description:
On this episode we are joined by one of our favorites, Dr. Dennis Gross. This is Dr. Dennis's second appearance on the show (1st appearance Ep. 91). This episode goes into great detail around the topic of skin and skincare. We discuss anti-aging techniques, thinning skin, baby botox, acne, and what causes acne, myths surrounding skincare, & what to be cautious of when doing procedures with filler and fats. We Also finally convinced Michael to do some baby botox and recorded the whole process in this interview, so stay tuned. 

To connect with Dr. Dennis Gross click HERE
